item.title: Genesis
item.description: It’s customary to write a Hello World! app when one starts to familiarize oneself with a new language / framework. So I’ll start my journy with the same approach in the most famous esolang, AKA brainfuck. -[------->+<]>+++.-[--->++++<]>+.[--->+<]>---.[---->+<]>+++.---[->++++<]>.------------.---.--[--->+<]>-.[->+++<]>++.++++++++++.+++.--------..++.+++++.-------.-[--->+<]>--.[->+++<]>++.+++.++.++.+++++.>++++++++++..[->+++<]>++.--[-->+++<]>.[--->++<]>++.--[-->+++++<]>.-----[-->+++<]>.--------. Oh BTW, you can find the output here.
